about_the_game:
It’s party time! Grab your costume and head to the festivities with this Halloween party tileset for RPG Maker! Spooky decorations and fiendishly good treats await you.

The Halloween Party Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Floor paneling in 3 colors
Matching rugs in three colors. Mix and match for your favorite aesthetic!

Walls:

Dark striped walls add a festive backdrop! Choose from orange, purple or gray. One version has eyeballs on the trim!

Also includes:

Moonlit background (large, so you can resize it to fit your game!)
Cobwebs
Mesh netting in black and white
Orange, purple and black bows
Skull lights and pumpkin lights on strings (can be repeated for infinite lengths)
Fluffy fur backdrop
Halloween banner
Lit lanterns
Jack o lanterns with lit and unlit versions
“Cauldrons” with glowing punch in different colors
Dressed table – choose your own decor!
Snacks and treats
Ghosts and bats
Balloons
Hanging ghouls
Candy decorations

and more!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
